This tests for a repaint bug. The old caret position should be invalidated when a paragraph separator is inserted.




(GraphicsLayer
  (bounds 800.00 600.00)
  (children 1
    (GraphicsLayer
      (bounds 800.00 600.00)
      (contentsOpaque 1)
      (drawsContent 1)
      (repaint rects
        (rect 3.00 89.00 794.00 20.00)
        (rect 3.00 84.00 794.00 5.00)
        (rect 8.00 84.00 784.00 20.00)
        (rect 7.00 63.00 3.00 21.00)
        (rect 7.00 83.00 3.00 21.00)
      )
    )
  )
)
